---
category: news
title: "Machine learning identifies candidates for drug repurposing in Alzheimer’s disease"
excerpt: "Clinical trials of novel therapeutics for Alzheimer’s Disease (AD) have provided largely negative results, so far. Here, the authors present a machine learning framework that quantifies potential associations between the pathology of AD severity and gene-based molecular mechanisms to enable drug repurposing."
publishedDateTime: 2021-02-15T10:34:00Z
